game.name: Slime Lab
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Become a slime scientist in your own VR lab and play with the most satisfying slimes! Experiment with fluid physics to create endless combinations, using unique colors and charms for your next customer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a slime scientist in your own VR lab and play with the most satisfying slimes! Experiment with fluid physics to create endless combinations, using unique colors and charms for your next customer.
